chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (A : Set) (R : Rel A) (xs bs cs : list A), GoodR A R (xs ++ bs) -> GoodR A R (xs ++ cs ++ bs)

Premises:
GoodR : forall A : Set, Rel A -> list A -> Set
Fin.R : forall n : nat, Fin.t ?m -> Fin.t (n + ?m) where ?m : [ |- nat]
Inductive GFormula (TA TX AA AF : Type) : Type := TT : Tauto.GFormula | FF : Tauto.GFormula | X : TX -> Tauto.GFormula | A : TA -> AA -> Tauto.GFormula | Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | N : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | I : Tauto.GFormula -> option AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula Arguments Tauto.GFormula {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.TT {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.FF {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.X {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.A {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.Cj {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.D
Rel = fun A : Set => A -> A -> Prop : Set -> Type Arguments Rel _%type_scope
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
monGoodR1 : forall (A : Set) (R : Rel A) (xs bs : list A), GoodR A R bs -> GoodR A R (xs ++ bs)
monExistsL : forall (A : Set) (P : Pred A) (xs bs cs : list A), ExistsL A P (xs ++ bs) -> ExistsL A P (xs ++ cs ++ bs)
monExistsL1 : forall (A : Set) (P : Pred A) (xs bs : list A), ExistsL A P bs -> ExistsL A P (xs ++ bs)
SearchG : forall (A : Set) (R : Rel A) (a : A) (l : list A), GoodR A R l -> GoodR A R (a :: l)
FoundG : forall (A : Set) (R : Rel A) (a : A) (l : list A), ExistsL A (fun x : A => R x a) l -> GoodR A R (a :: l)
GoodR_rec : forall (A : Set) (R : Rel A) (P : forall l : list A, GoodR A R l -> Set), (forall (a : A) (l : list A) (e : ExistsL A (fun x : A => R x a) l), P (a :: l) (FoundG A R a l e)) -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A) (g : GoodR A R l), P l g -> P (a :: l) (SearchG A R a l g)) -> forall (l : list A) (g : GoodR A R l), P l g
GoodR_rect : forall (A : Set) (R : Rel A) (P : forall l : list A, GoodR A R l -> Type), (forall (a : A) (l : list A) (e : ExistsL A (fun x : A => R x a) l), P (a :: l) (FoundG A R a l e)) -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A) (g : GoodR A R l), P l g -> P (a :: l) (SearchG A R a l g)) -> forall (l : list A) (g : GoodR A R l), P l g
GoodR_sind : forall (A : Set) (R : Rel A) (P : forall l : list A, GoodR A R l -> SProp), (forall (a : A) (l : list A) (e : ExistsL A (fun x : A => R x a) l), P (a :: l) (FoundG A R a l e)) -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A) (g : GoodR A R l), P l g -> P (a :: l) (SearchG A R a l g)) -> forall (l : list A) (g : GoodR A R l), P l g
GoodR_ind : forall (A : Set) (R : Rel A) (P : forall l : list A, GoodR A R l -> Prop), (forall (a : A) (l : list A) (e : ExistsL A (fun x : A => R x a) l), P (a :: l) (FoundG A R a l e)) -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A) (g : GoodR A R l), P l g -> P (a :: l) (SearchG A R a l g)) -> forall (l : list A) (g : GoodR A R l), P l g
Relation_Operators.d_conc : forall (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (x y : A) (l : list A), Relation_Operators.clos_refl A leA x y -> Relation_Operators.Desc A leA (l ++ y :: nil) -> Relation_Operators.Desc A leA ((l ++ y :: nil) ++ x :: nil)
Relation_Operators.Desc_sind : forall (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (P : list A -> SProp), P nil -> (forall x : A, P (x :: nil)) -> (forall (x y : A) (l : list A), Relation_Operators.clos_refl A leA x y -> Relation_Operators.Desc A leA (l ++ y :: nil) -> P (l ++ y :: nil) -> P ((l ++ y :: nil) ++ x :: nil)) -> forall l : list A, Relation_Operators.Desc A leA l -> P l
Relation_Operators.Desc_ind : forall (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (P : list A -> Prop), P nil -> (forall x : A, P (x :: nil)) -> (forall (x y : A) (l : list A), Relation_Operators.clos_refl A leA x y -> Relation_Operators.Desc A leA (l ++ y :: nil) -> P (l ++ y :: nil) -> P ((l ++ y :: nil) ++ x :: nil)) -> forall l : list A, Relation_Operators.Desc A leA l -> P l
Forall2_app : forall (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop) (l1 l2 : list A) (l1' l2' : list B), Forall2 R l1 l1' -> Forall2 R l2 l2' -> Forall2 R (l1 ++ l2) (l1' ++ l2')
Forall2_app_inv_l : forall (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop) (l1 l2 : list A) (l' : list B), Forall2 R (l1 ++ l2) l' -> exists l1' l2' : list B, Forall2 R l1 l1' /\ Forall2 R l2 l2' /\ l' = l1' ++ l2'
Forall2_app_inv_r : forall (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop) (l1' l2' : list B) (l : list A), Forall2 R l (l1' ++ l2') -> exists l1 l2 : list A, Forall2 R l1 l1' /\ Forall2 R l2 l2' /\ l = l1 ++ l2
Inductive Desc (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) : list A -> Prop := d_nil : Relation_Operators.Desc A leA nil | d_one : forall x : A, Relation_Operators.Desc A leA (x :: nil) | d_conc : forall (x y : A) (l : list A), Relation_Operators.clos_refl A leA x y -> Relation_Operators.Desc A leA (l ++ y :: nil) -> Relation_Operators.Desc A leA ((l ++ y :: nil) ++ x :: nil) Arguments Relation_Operators.Desc _%type_scope _%function_scope _%list_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.d_nil _%type_scope _%function_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.d_one _%type_scope _%function_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.d_conc _%type_scope _%function_scope _ _ _%list_scope
SearchE : forall (A : Set) (P : Pred A) (a : A) (l : list A), ExistsL A P l -> ExistsL A P (a :: l)
rev_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Prop), P nil -> (forall (x : A) (l : list A), P l -> P (l ++ x :: nil)) -> forall l : list A, P l
FoundE : forall (A : Set) (P : Pred A) (a : A) (l : list A), P a -> ExistsL A P (a :: l)
Inductive ExistsL (A : Set) (P : Pred A) : list A -> Set := FoundE : forall (a : A) (l : list A), P a -> ExistsL A P (a :: l) | SearchE : forall (a : A) (l : list A), ExistsL A P l -> ExistsL A P (a :: l) Arguments ExistsL _%type_scope _ _%list_scope Arguments FoundE _%type_scope _ _ _%list_scope Arguments SearchE _%type_scope _ _ _%list_scope
Forall2_cons : forall (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop) (x : A) (y : B) (l : list A) (l' : list B), R x y -> Forall2 R l l' -> Forall2 R (x :: l) (y :: l')
fold_left_app : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B -> A) (l l' : list B) (i : A), fold_left f (l ++ l') i = fold_left f l' (fold_left f l i)
exists_last : forall (A : Type) (l : list A), l <> nil -> {l' : list A & {a : A | l = l' ++ a :: nil}}
Inductive Forall2 (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop) : list A -> list B -> Prop := Forall2_nil : Forall2 R nil nil | Forall2_cons : forall (x : A) (y : B) (l : list A) (l' : list B), R x y -> Forall2 R l l' -> Forall2 R (x :: l) (y :: l') Arguments Forall2 [A B]%type_scope _%function_scope (_ _)%list_scope Arguments Forall2_nil [A B]%type_scope _%function_scope Arguments Forall2_cons [A B]%type_scope [R]%function_scope _ _ [l l']%list_scope
filter_app : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> bool) (l l' : list A), filter f (l ++ l') = filter f l ++ filter f l'
map_app : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l l' : list A), map f (l ++ l') = map f l ++ map f l'
Inductive clos_refl (A : Type) (R : Relation_Definitions.relation A) (x : A) : A -> Prop := r_step : forall y : A, R x y -> Relation_Operators.clos_refl A R x y | r_refl : Relation_Operators.clos_refl A R x x Arguments Relation_Operators.clos_refl _%type_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.r_step _%type_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.r_refl _%type_scope
NoDup_remove_1 : forall (A : Type) (l l' : list A) (a : A), NoDup (l ++ a :: l') -> NoDup (l ++ l')
NoDup_remove : forall (A : Type) (l l' : list A) (a : A), NoDup (l ++ a :: l') -> NoDup (l ++ l') /\ ~ In a (l ++ l')
NoDup_remove_2 : forall (A : Type) (l l' : list A) (a : A), NoDup (l ++ a :: l') -> ~ In a (l ++ l')
